metadata.title: CVE-2024-25768 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: OpenDMARC 1.4.2 contains a null pointer dereference vulnerability in/OpenDMARC/libopendmarc/opendmarc_policy.c.

criterions.comment: opendmarc: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
